text.div:
GAO Answer Format

Codes indicating the types of questions allowed in a questionnaire for evaluation of orders against guidelines.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/item-type
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/item-type
    CodeDisplay
    referenceReferenceQuestion with a reference to another resource (practitioner, organization, etc.) as an answer
    attachmentAttachmentQuestion with binary content such as a image, PDF, etc. as an answer

name: GAO Answer Format
description: Codes indicating the types of questions allowed in a questionnaire for evaluation of orders against guidelines.
requirements: Limits the questions to the kinds of questions commonly supported by clinical decision support systems.
